ExtendedSection.Title: Sitemap Master Configurations vs. Sitemap Configurations

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
Sitemap master configurations are very similar to standard sitemap configurations. They define which

  • content elements
  • formatters
  • dynamic functions
  • property definitions
  • attributes

are available on a site.

The following figure shows a sitemap master configuration opened in the editor.

Text.content:
While sitemap configurations are stored below the /.content/.config path of a site, sitemap master configurations typically are part of a template module and therein by convention are stored in a subfolder configuration/.
